hotels.title: Thailand Oceanfront Escape 90-Minutes from Bangkok with Two Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Dive into a world of coastal cool at Novotel Marina Sriracha, where the outdoor pool melts into the Gulf of Thailand's azure waters. All-day dining at Food Exchange serves up international favourites, while the breezy pool bar keeps the tropical vibes flowing with cocktails and light bites. When you're ready to unwind, InBalance spa beckons with traditional Thai massages and rejuvenating treatments. Sriracha is a hidden coastal gem that's much more than its hot sauce namesake. Explore the local Saphanjarin fishing pier, venture to attractions like the Sriracha Tiger Zoo or kick back on the pristine beaches of Ko Si Chang Island. This thriving waterfront town features everything from traditional night markets bursting with street food to contemporary shopping at Robinson Lifestyle mall.
